programme.title: Rage New Music
programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Professor T
programme.desc: When an attempt is made on a billionaire businessmans life, Professor T suspects the culprit may be much closer to home than the police suspect. Its Professor Ts birthday and with it comes a haunting childhood memory.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Lisa Millar is on an odyssey to discover Australias largest inland waterway, the magnificent Gippsland Lakes in Victoria. It is home to over 300 native wildlife species, including the rare and endangered Burrunan dolphin.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Panic spreads when an arsonist targets three businesses, invoking the childrens story of the Three Little Pigs. Personal feeling clouds Humphreys judgment when he starts to believe Archie could be their culprit.

programme.title: rage Guest Programmer: Private Function
programme.desc: Join Naarm punks Private Function for a naughty rage guest program that nearly didnt make it to air thanks to a litany of profanities and jokes.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from new releases to classics and the long-forgotten.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: David Speers is in New York for the UN General Assembly, joined by Laura Tingle. In studio Melissa Clarke and the panel of Katina Curtis, Peter Hartcher and Jennifer Hewett discuss the week including climate targets and PNG.

programme.title: The World This Week
programme.desc: Andrea Nierhoff presents a roundup of big stories from across the globe. This week: Israel moves deeper into Gaza City, King Charles hosts Donald Trump at Windsor Castle, plus tributes for actor Robert Redford.

programme.title: Songs Of Praise: Sacred Walks On The Wales Coast Path
programme.desc: Aled Jones joins a gang of intrepid walkers to celebrate the power of pilgrimage on the Wales Coast Path.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.sub-title: Animal Attraction: Gardens for Bees and Birds
programme.desc: Costa finds out how to choose a chook breed, Sophie plants for buzz pollinators, Jerry has tips for living with possums, Millie explores a backyard wildlife corridor, and we meet an ornithologist tracking wedge-tailed eagles.

programme.title: Grand Designs New Zealand
programme.desc: Andrew Simpson and Krysty Peebles are building their home next to Andrews father and his partners property. Andrews determined to build to the highest environmental standards and get a gorgeous house on a budget as well.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin
programme.desc: A new posting to the town of Loch Iris, and Jay Swans hopes of a new beginning with Mary are shattered when hes nearly sideswiped by a stolen car, the suspicious death of an elderly nun and a missing child.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: When Screen Goblin goes on holiday, Harry decides to play the latest super scary game with the help of Gems favourite toy P_Nutz. But when spooky stuff starts happening, could P_Nutz be behind it!?

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from new releases to classics and the long-forgotten.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: When Nom Nom shows up on the Bears doorstep, disheveled and deposed from his spot as cutest Internet star ever after a recent meltdown, he enlists the Bears to help him regain his title.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Humiliated by Gabriel Agreste, Chloes mother gets akumatized into Style Queen. Armed with a sceptre and determined to get revenge, she attacks Adrien. Will Ladybug manage to stop her without Cat Noir here to help her?

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Rosemary Riddle
programme.desc: Ezra is grumpy when his visiting Nanna interrupts his detective work until she unexpectedly gives the Inbestigators a case to crack.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Teenage Boss: Next Level
programme.desc: Labelled a tough boss by her mum, Arrayah is saving to see her pop idol but she doesnt factor in that some old habits die hard and families can be difficult to control.

programme.title: Speechless
programme.desc: Maya has jury duty, which is like a vacation for her until she learns Taylors mum is also there. JJ lies about his disabilities on an online dating site, while Ray is upset that Jimmy and Dylan spend too much time together.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!: Do Try This At Home
programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand get to grips with the heart and show how to build a pumping heart model in todays DO try this at home experiment.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: Its time to clean the Gamer Den! But when Gem and Harrys new video console comes to life and they can stop playing, the den might be filthy forever!

programme.title: rage Guest Programmer: G Flip
programme.desc: Buckle up because G Flip is behind the rage programming wheel and taking us on a Big Ol Dream Ride this weekend, lining up artists like Doechii, Billy Joel and Prince.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: The Bears are fed up with the decay of etiquette at todays theatres. They take it upon themselves to be the police of the theatre, sneaking up like ninjas to shush people who ruin the movie for others.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: After transforming into Queen Bee to try and impress her mother, Chloe gets akumatized into Queen Wasp. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir manage to stop this superhero turned supervillain?

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.desc: In this two part episode, Odd Squad agents compete in Olympic style games to determine who gets to be Ms. O for the day.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Bitzer cant find his buried bone. Its up to Shaun and the flock to try and find it, but X doesnt always mark the spot.

programme.title: Abbott Elementary
programme.desc: Ava asks Janine to help her teach the after-school step class, but they dont agree on how to run the program.

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: Morgana uses Gwen to lure Arthur into a deadly trap.

programme.title: Penn And Teller: Fool Us
programme.desc: Featured magicians include John Michael Hinton, Billy Hsueh, Shimshi and Bernardo Sedlacek.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Silverpoint
programme.desc: Fisher has taken control of the Artefact. With no time to lose, Meg needs Finn, Alice and Elliot to join her on a mission to save her friends.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.sub-title: Miracle Queen (the Battle Of The Miraculous Pt2)
programme.desc: Hawk Moth akumatizes Chloe into Miracle Queen to put a fatal plan into action. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir escape it?

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: Amid a bot uprising the Novas defeat a hijacker, but disaster strikes for their Stardustian friend.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic: The Crystal Empire
programme.desc: Synopsis

programme.title: Chopsticks Or Fork?
programme.desc: You dont need to be Chinese to run a successful Chinese restaurant, as proven by the Chiems, a Vietnamese family at Gawler Palace Chinese Restaurant in South Australia where their honey chicken reigns supreme.

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: With Janey away at university, Susan is depressed to find she is now the only woman in the Harper house. Much to her husbands consternation, she eyes Bens cousins daughter Abi as the ideal solution to Janeys empty room.

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.sub-title: Fire Extinguisher, Nail Gun, Shotgun Chandelier
programme.desc: Jon and Brian take on Hollywoods invisible assassins and a trio of tall tales of ingenious makeshift booby traps.

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: Some of the best loved stand-ups and a raft of the next generation of comedians, featuring Russell Kane, Rhys James, Sharon Wanjohi, Tom Ward, Adam Flood, Micky Overman and Travis Jay.

programme.title: rage Boiler Room Special
programme.desc: From The Chemical Brothers to Fatboy Slim, M.I.A, Flume and more, rage cracks out the hydralyte for a sweat induced party that pays homage to the yesteryear of festival boiler rooms.

programme.title: Documentary Now!
programme.sub-title: Gentle and Soft: The Story Of The Blue Jean Committee, Part 2
programme.desc: A special documentary charting the rise and fall of softrocks seminal band, the Blue Jean Committee. (Final)

programme.title: Silverpoint
programme.desc: Kaz is still missing and the rest of Dragonfly feel uneasy about leaving the camp without her. Fisher has a proposal for Louis - but can he be trusted?Â

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: The Nektons try to stop a fallen satellites fuel from polluting a marine sanctuary. But someone else is interested in the satellite: Alpheus Benthos, who is intent on finding Lemuria before them!

programme.title: Ninjago Dragons Rising
programme.desc: Lloyd, Arin and Sora travel return Riyu to his clan and discover a strange, new power to confront the dragon hunters who follow them.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic: Princess Twilight Sparkle
programme.desc: Synopsis

programme.title: Miraculous World: New York, United Heroez
programme.desc: During a school field trip, Ladybug and Cat Noir meet the American superheroes, whom they have to save from an akumatised super-villain. They discover that Miraculous exist in the United States too.

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.sub-title: Pane In The Glass, Onions And You
programme.desc: The MythBusters take on an incredibly dangerous, glass shattering movie myth and then put themselves and six volunteers through the rigours of finding a cure for "onion tears".

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Hate speech vs free speech, with journalists and media personalities such as Jimmy Kimmel losing their jobs for their comments about Charlie Kirk and Trumps threatened crackdown on NGOs. Plus mental health and UFOs.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: The 15th and final season of ER begins with the devastating repercussions of the ambulance explosion. As Morris and Neela do everything they can to save a wounded colleague, Abby treats a young girl injured during the blast.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: Everything in the garden is so noisy that Igglepiggle moves away to find a quiet place to be by himself.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector gets lost in the fog, and has to use sound to get him home.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula go to the park to feed the ducks. Sula is very good at standing quietly and giving the ducks just the right amount of food.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppas playgroup is putting on a play. Peppa is going to be Little Red Riding Hood. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig help her to practice her lines. On the night of the play, Peppa and her friends act out the story beautifully.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Unable to pay the elves, King Thistle has to go to work to earn a coin.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.sub-title: The Cuttlebaby Sitter / Flounder the Leader
programme.desc: Ariel babysits adorable cuttlebabies. Flounder is chosen as the team coach.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.sub-title: Long Among the Pines / A Mermaid in Pitchfork Pines
programme.desc: Frankie and Zoe learn safety in the forest with Ranger Ben, while Drac and his Monster Pets help Melusine, a mermaid, learn to fly in this exciting and fun-filled adventure!

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds visit an observatory to explore our planets! They see how planets orbit the Sun, what theyre made of, and theres a special trip to Mars!

programme.title: Wilfrid Gordon Mcdonald Partridge
programme.desc: When 6-year-old Wilfrid discovers his 96-year-old best friend Nancy has lost her memory, he embarks on a heartwarming quest to help her remember. Based on the classic childrens book by Mem Fox.

programme.title: Mixmups
programme.desc: When Yapette is poorly and loses her woof, can the Mixmups find a way to make her woofy and waggy again.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.sub-title: Dance With The Tree Of Wisdom
programme.desc: Lets dance with The Tree of Wisdom, shake our arms, Wiggle like no ones watching, and learn some new moves along the way!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Three paints Two with one too many blocks and realises disguises wont help.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George join Granny Pig and her friends to play at being Vikings. The Vikings are having fun on Grandpa Pigs boat until they realise theyve left their picnic behind!

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Lu learns to commit to a decision

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Bobby and Tish are outside in the garden having a picnic, they each have one cookie left each. Tish gobbles hers up like a cookie eating monster but before Bobby can eat his, an ant steals it away!

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Tidbit swallows a watermelon seed and worries hes going to grow a watermelon in his tummy.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: There is thick snow all over town, Myrtle and Joses delivery van are snowed in so Myrtle asks Stanley to get some shopping for her.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: When Orticia send Gekkos pumpkins bad, Gekko is desperate to stop them.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: When the cadets are put in charge of running the lifeguard club all by themselves, it proves to be the toughest - and most rewarding - day of their lives.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas is asked to help at the animal park for the day and realises theres more to the job than he first thought.

programme.title: Peppa Pig: Caravan
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are on a caravan adventure but they dont know where to go!

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: When Wallace hurts his paw and needs to rest, Millie finds a creative way to carry him around so he doesnt miss out on any of the fun.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: There are so many different kinds of butterflies and we want to meet them all! From eggs to caterpillars to cocoons to wings, Clarence and the kids learn about all things butterfly and get to make their own butterfly attracting exhibit, right in the sanctuary!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family take Goldie the Fish to Doctor Hamster for her check-up. Dr Hamster wishes she could exercise more, so Grampy Rabbit decides to build something to help.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale Of The Spectacular Sledge
programme.desc: When the rabbits discover a hoard of much needed winter vegetables in Mr McGregors garden, they must find a way to transport them - by building a spectacular new sled!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: After a tropical storm carries a little goby out to sea, the Vegimals and Kwazii set off to return him to his home atop a waterfall. The steep climb doesnt pose a problem for the goby until his predators arrive.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At the chemist, Bluey and Bingo have fun playing with the CCTV screens.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar set up a new toy for a tiger. They then hold an amazing leaf insect and find out how this tiny creature has something in common with the tiger.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: The Pontipines are riding on the Ninky Nonk but Mr and Mrs Pontipine cant find the children.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The sounds in a Wildlife Park are extreme, which gives the Sound Collector a noisy idea!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Its snack time for Bing but the only banana left is too mushy to eat. Flop suggests making a smoothie with it instead.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George is making bubbles and Peppa is popping them. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles then makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to play in.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Its the night before Halloween and Bitzer is charged with guarding the Farmers 3 prize pumpkins. Despite Shaun and the flocks best efforts, the pumpkins mysteriously disappear, leaving nothing but a trail of ghostly slime.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Naughty Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Ariel uses magic to clean her room. Ariel befriends a clam.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: The Super Monsters reimagine Alice in Wonderland with fresh adventures, crafting a magical stage play that celebrates creativity, teamwork, and imagination.

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds discover some of the clever things that happen on railways! Two passenger trains become one in a faraway railway station, and then they see how freight trains move giant boxes all around the country!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman is playing Superheroes with James - Norman is Norman-Man and James is his sidekick Atomic Boy. Suddenly Lion the cat floats off in a boat and James and Norman find they have a real rescue on their hands.

programme.title: Mixmups
programme.desc: Spin finds his favourite socks under his bed, but theyre too small for him. The Mixmups mix up an adventure to find a way to grow them big again.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Join Evie Wiggle as she writes a poem! With each Wiggle asking for her help to remember something, Evie makes a helpful poem, showing that inspiration can come from anywhere!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: The Numberblocks have to do some clever counting to cross a sticky swamp.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Charlotte Sheep is babysitting her cousin Suzy Sheep and her best friend Peppa. Peppa and Suzy are excited at their sleepover and sit up in bed talking about what they will do when they are all grown up.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Declan causes a stir when he decides not to say please.

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Tish and Bobby go into Rosas art studio, even though they arent meant to go in there without her. Tish then, accidently, knocks ink all over Rosas latest picture.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: When Zigzags ADHD gives her a case of the hops, Vida teaches her how to make a to-do list.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Benjamin and Hettie find an old treasure map that leads to Blue Whiskers Pirate Shipwreck! They ask Stanley to help them find it using his submarine, and maybe bring it back as an exhibit for everyone to enjoy.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Determined to perform a magic trick, Connor finds an ancient teleporting sarcophagus that make things disappear.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: A celebrity quokka visits Kangaroo Beach to film an episode of the smash hit TV series Wallaby Waters.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Thomas finds out that the Earls Technology Fair will bring new inventions to Sodor, he sets out to prove that steam engines are the best inventions ever.

programme.title: Wilfrid Gordon Mcdonald Partridge
programme.desc: When 6-year-old Wilfrid discovers his 96-year-old best friend Nancy has lost her memory, he embarks on a heartwarming quest to help her remember. Based on the classic childrens book by Mem Fox.

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.desc: When Orla breaks up the band Soundcheck, the Mobile Unit team must convince the band members to reunite. On top of that, the Mobile Unit must make sure a villainous rival band doesnt hypnotise people with their music.

programme.title: Little J And Big Cuz
programme.desc: The kids are baffled when precious things go missing so detectives Little J and Levi search for clues. Big Cuz knows one piece of the puzzle - overwhelmed by receiving her pen licence, shes hidden her pen.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its snowing and Grampy Rabbit has built a jetpack. He shoots off into the distance ending up on top of a snowy mountain. Miss Rabbit goes to rescue him, but Grampy Rabbit is the one that rescues them all.

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes
programme.desc: Catboy and Bastet rivalry and egos causes them to fall for Pharaoh boys plan.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. Will Mr Brown really shave off all his hair for charity?

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the latest on todays news, covering whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart in Perth.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. Weve got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Craig Smart.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: If Youre Listening
programme.desc: Theres been a spike in antisemitic attacks and recently ASIO revealed that some of them were coordinated by Iran in an effort to destablise their enemies. So is this a signal of Irans strength - or a weakening regime?

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan, James Glenday, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who have appeared on News Breakfast. Plus our film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: Asia News Week
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus whats trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Hate speech vs free speech, with journalists and media personalities such as Jimmy Kimmel losing their jobs for their comments about Charlie Kirk and Trumps threatened crackdown on NGOs. Plus mental health and UFOs.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: Start your morning with the latest headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories and the overnight news from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch
programme.desc: Bridget, James, Emma and the team share highlights of their Far North Queensland trip, Morning Wars stars Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon, Margot Robbie and Colin Farrell, plus Mystery Road Origins Mark Coles Smith.

programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: ABC Evening News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and todays stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Fiona Willan.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Fiona Willan.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: Fiona Willan brings you the latest headlines and a brief summary of the days top stories from ABC News.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and todays stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Fiona Willan.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend
programme.desc: When you need to know whats happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you the days events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Fiona Willan.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the days top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of whats happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: Businesses suffer as the search for an alleged killer hits tourism hard, the fight to save some of the countrys purest honey from a deadly bee parasite, and meet the man who paid $66,000 for a tray of mangoes.

programme.title: If Youre Listening
programme.sub-title: Charlie Kirks murder sparks calls for revenge
programme.desc: Just minutes after the assassination of Charlie Kirk, US President Donald Trump and his allies called for revenge on what they call "left-wing extremists". So is a crackdown on anti-Trump groups now inevitable?

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight
programme.desc: The final word on the days top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australias most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Fiona Willan.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: Asia News Week
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong looks at the week in Asia: A ceasefire between Thailand and Cambodia under strain, the head of South Koreas unification church questioned plus Beijing and Manila trade barbs over another South China Sea incident.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Censor-in-chief? Trumps warning to TV networks after Kimmel is pulled off air. Was it a drone, meteor or UFO? We talk mystery sightings and the search for extraterrestrial life. Plus cracks in the mental health system.

programme.title: National Press Club Address
programme.desc: Dr Vanessa Pirotta, leading wildlife scientist, addresses the National Press Club of Australia on the topic of "Australias Scientific Future: Built on Education, Connection and Investment".

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: Start your morning with the latest headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories and the overnight news from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: Businesses suffer as the search for an alleged killer hits tourism hard, the fight to save some of the countrys purest honey from a deadly bee parasite, and meet the man who paid $66,000 for a tray of mangoes.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: David Speers is in New York for the UN General Assembly, joined by Laura Tingle. In studio Melissa Clarke and the panel of Katina Curtis, Peter Hartcher and Jennifer Hewett discuss the week including climate targets and PNG.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan
programme.desc: The latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australias deaf community connected and informed. Presented by Ruby Cornish.

programme.title: ABC Evening News
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australias best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: Meredith Sheehan brings you the latest headlines and a brief summary of the days top stories from ABC News.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and todays stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend
programme.desc: When you need to know whats happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you todays events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the days top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of whats happening as it unfolds.
